name: com.kiro.ide.integration
description: Kiro editor integration for supporting Kiro as code editor for unity. Adds support for generating csproj files for intellisense purposes, auto discovery of installations, etc.

_upm.changelog:
Integration:

- Fixed access level issues for VisualStudioInstallation and related classes
- Fixed IGenerator type conflicts by using fully qualified names
- Fixed JSONNode access level issues
- Changed internal classes to public to resolve CS0122 errors
